text: Zisas ne nzuaim, mba mbik, ana wo vhargeŋ mbovara thav, ninɨk ana mbuim, ana zav wo thɨpani phɨrgiap, Zisas nɨman fav, wo nɨma ndi nuiana dagi. Ana wo nɨma ndi nuiana dav, mbaram mba gumgi gu mbigi vhɨrve nɨmara mba ana suirigi bigɨna nɨɨeŋ bun Zisas ga nzuai. Ana nen ana nzuav vhɨra khaŋ ana nzuai, “Gu ndu shaa suiravra thagim, nan rɨmrɨm fhura thuga vugi.”
